DOC.brief_summary: The investigators are measuring hepatocellular carcinoma(HCC)stiffness using Acoustic Radiation Force Impulse (ARFI) technique to enhance the diagnostic accuracy for HCC stratifications and treatment efficacy.
DOC.brief_title: Stiffness Measurement of Liver Tumors and Visceral Parenchyma
DOC.detailed_description: Regression modelings as well as validity testings including cut-off identification will be acquired by performing both qualitative and quantitative measurements of HCC using reference diagnostic modalities e.g. pathology grading, dynamic CT scanning, etc.
DOC.criteria: with HCC subjects with liver cancer other than HCC subjects with treated HCC post major abdominal surgery contraindications to liver tumor biopsy contraindications to local percutaneous treatment of liver tumors ARFI measurement low quality
